item.description:

item.title: Mentioned by Edmonton Journal
item.description:
Bernard Valcourt stands up to grilling but Opposition MPs question his grasp of ...
OTTAWA — Aboriginal Affairs Minister Bernard Valcourt defended his government's record in a rare four-hour evening grilling session in the House of Commons this week, but his answers left Opposition MPs saying the veteran politician doesn't have a grasp of his ... NDP MP Charlie Angus asked Valcourt for specific figures, such as the number of reserve schools that need to be replaced, the number that have been listed as substandard or condemned, and the number of students eligible for post-secondary funding ...
